definition: to suffer (from an illness)/to fall ill

sentences.english: Women are prone to breast cancer, so they need regular checkups.
sentences.chinese: 女人容易罹患乳癌，所以他们需要定期检查。

sentences.english: You're more likely to develop high blood pressure during pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 你更容易罹患妊娠期糖尿病。

sentences.english: Exercise is also strongly associated with a reduced risk of dementia late in life.
sentences.chinese: 锻炼还可大大降低老年期罹患早发性痴呆症的危险。

sentences.english: Cigarette smoking increases the risk of developing mouth cancers.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟提升罹患口腔癌的风险。

sentences.english: When inhaled, the radiation exposure from radon may lead to lung cancer.
sentences.chinese: 当吸入之后，来自氡的放射暴露可导致人们罹患肺癌。
研究显示，经常睡午觉会增加罹患二型糖尿病的危险。

sentences.english: Cell Phone Use Endangers Boneheads The jury is still out on the relationship between cell phone use and brain tumors.
sentences.chinese: 使用手机和罹患脑瘤之间的关系目前还没有定论。

sentences.english: Taking regular lunchtime siestas could increase the risk of developing Type 2 diabetes, according to research.
sentences.chinese: 研究显示，经常睡午觉会增加罹患二型糖尿病的危险。

sentences.english: None of the participants was a smoker or had diabetes or high blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 受试者没有嗜烟或者罹患糖尿病高血压的病史。

sentences.english: How can people with diabetes reduce their risk of retinopathy or other diabetes-related blindness?
sentences.chinese: 糖尿病人应该如何降低罹患糖尿病相关失明的风险？

sentences.english: Measles used to strike four million children a year.
sentences.chinese: 过去每年有四百万名儿童罹患麻疹。

sentences.english: The fact is that Mrs. Davis had two dreadful diagnoses.
sentences.chinese: 事实情况是，戴维斯夫人罹患的两种病都是要命的。

sentences.english: A 53-year-old man presented with sore throat as the early symptom of an acute thoracic aortic dissection.
sentences.chinese: 本文报告一位53岁男性罹患主动脉剥离的案例。

sentences.english: Prostate-cancer-related mortality is also significantly higher in black men than in men of European descent.
sentences.chinese: 罹患前列腺癌的黑人，其死亡率也显著高于欧洲人群。

sentences.english: You will have a greater chance of getting oral diseases like Gingivitis and periodontitis.
sentences.chinese: 你罹患牙垠炎和牙周炎等口腔疾病的机率会大大增加。

sentences.english: Overweight and obesity increase the risk of heart disease and cancer.
sentences.chinese: 超重和肥胖增加了罹患心脏病和癌症的风险。

definition: to contract (an illness)/to be afflicted with/to suffer from
cancers of the nose and throat/nasopharyngeal carcinoma (NPC)
